itemDescription: Dean of Science and Engineering at Auckland Institute of Technology (1940-2006)

wikipedia_page.main: Robert "Roy" Geddes  (4 August 1940 – 25 August 2006) was a Scottish-born New Zealand chemist and biochemist, and worked as Dean of Science and Engineering at Auckland Institute of Technology.

response: * 25 August – Roy Geddes, physical biochemistry academic (born 1940)
